transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Ek minute dal raha hu mai note bhi.
Executive: Ji.

Customer: Haan ho gaya na?
Executive: Ho gaya? Ab aap settings me jao ek baar, mai aapko bata deti hu kaha se numbers check kar sakte ho, on off kaha se kar sakte ho, future me bhi agar aapko requirement ho.
Customer: Haan setting me gaya.
Executive: Thik hai, ab waha par aapko ek option dikh raha hoga PNS call setting.
Customer: PNS setting? Upar dekhiyega.
Executive: Haan, haan. Dikha? Ab usme dekho number likhe ja rahe hai, che saat number hai, usme se char number on hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo charo number is samay aapke PNS me active hai.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Nahi ye mujhe kya karna hai? Abhi 89 last me 61 641 ye aur aur ek hai start 77 se hota hai aur khatam 744 se hota hai ye do number hi rakhne hai mujhe.
Executive: Haan to koi baat nahi aap waha se dekho jiske aage aapko jo nahi chahiye uska jo aage off ka sign hai aap usko add kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan ho gaya.
Customer: Bas? Ho gaya?
Customer: Thik hai sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir iske alawa aur koi issues jo aap mere se puchna chah rahe ho?
Customer: Mera purpose yahi tha puchne ka lekin wo 401 pe kyu call ja raha hai mujhe ye nahi pata chal raha hai.
Executive: Sir basically ab wo koi glitch hoga to wo correct ho jana chahiye, don't worry.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai? Okay.
Customer: Thik hai sir to aapka jo ye concern hai usko mai close kar rahi hu. Aapka ye thik ho gaya jiske liye aapne customer care se help liya tha, aapke paas mail aayega please usse revert jarur karna.
Customer: A mam wo abhi ek mail ID bhi update karna tha lekin wo kuch to bata raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Thik hai, kariye profile pe jaiye.
Customer: Profile pe jao kya?
Executive: Haanji. Waha par edit ka option dikh raha hoga bilkul side me likha hua.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute. Aapka company logo hai uske upar edit ka sign hai us par jayenge, waha par aapka mail ID hai primary aur secondary dono. Uske aage pencil ka sign hai us par click karke aap change kar sakte hai.

Customer: Haan edit pe gaya mai.
Executive: Haan ab usme primary secondary email dono aa rahi hai. Aap change kar sakte hai apne hisab se.
Customer: Primary aa raha hai mera info@united.co.in aur dusra aa raha hai alternate mktg@united.co.in. To mujhe info ka mail badalna hai.
Executive: Haan to uske aage jo pencil ka sign hai us par click karke.
Customer: Haan haan. Info ka mail Gaurav Kumar ka dena. Gaurav Kumar ka hi dena hai info ka mail.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Mam chal raha hai mail do minute.
Executive: Thik hai no problem sir, mai call par hi hu. Jab tak aapka issue resolve nahi hota koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Gaurav Kumar wala kholna hai.

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapko ek mail ID mail OTP aaya hoga.
Customer: Haan message.

Customer: Apne.

Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir, phone laga tha aapko.
Executive: Sir ho gaya?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai thik hai thik hai.
Customer: A mam ye to mera hi number dikha raha hai udhar info pe gaya na mai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mere number pe OTP aa raha hai bol raha hai lekin nahi aaya mere number pe.
Executive: Nahi aaya? Call chal rahi hai isliye to nahi aaya sir?
Customer: Wahi baat hogi phir.
Executive: Haan aap ye wala karke dekhiyega ho jayega easily nahi ho to aap mere ko call kar lijiyega. Dusra sir hum buyleads use nahi kar rahe hai pichle do teen mahine se to kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Mujhe mera mere number pe maine update kiya tha lekin mujhe call aaya abhi tak aap us din bataye the sir maine number update karna hai mujhe. Lekin call bhi nahi aaya abhi tak.
Executive: Sir sirf calls nahi matlab mai keh rahi hu buyleads use nahi ho rahi hai. Call to tabhi aayega jab buyleads par active hoge.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai aa raha hai uske aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi jab mai ye puch rahi hu sir buyleads wagera use nahi ho rahi thi to kuch issue aa raha hai to mai help kar du?
Customer: Buyleads me thoda issue hai mujhe samajh me nahi aaya thoda.
Executive: Buyleads aapko ye bataiye aapko IndiaMART acche se use karna aata hai ya abhi aap naya join kiye ho?
Customer: Naya naya join kiya hai.
Executive: To ek kaam kariye aap mujhe apna email ID bata dijiye agar abhi free hai to aur agar thodi der ka time chahiye uske baad aap video meeting karna chahe to wo bata dijiye. Hum ek video meet karte hai pehle mai aapko acche se IndiaMART samjha deti hu. Thik hai? Jyada better hoga kyuki abhi services use nahi ho rahi hai to aise fayda nahi hai mai bas services ka jo concern hai isi baat pe close kar du.
Customer: Thik hai aap mujhe mail ID lijiye mera.
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: Vijay.

Customer: Vijay V I J A Y haan dot.
Executive: Dot.
Customer: T A N P U R E.
Executive: Tanpure?
Customer: @united.co.in.
Executive: @united.
Customer: Unitrade.
Executive: Accha uni trade.
Customer: Trade.
Executive: U N I T R A D E?
Customer: T R E T R E A D.
Executive: T R E A D?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aage sir? .co.in.
Executive: Sir hamara video meeting hua tha kya abhi recently?
Customer: Kya kya?
Executive: Hamara video meeting abhi recently hua hai kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Ho nahi paya tha wo hai na?
Customer: Nahi wo nahi.
Executive: Abhi karenge ya kitni der baad karenge bataiye.
Customer: Abhi bhi karenge chalo.

Executive: Sir mera video meeting to hua hai is case pe.
Customer: Haan ye hua hai? Hua to hai abhi 17 ko hamara.
Executive: Nahi mam video meeting nahi hua aapko ye mujhe lagta hai ye diya tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo is actually wo main is cheez ke regarding pehle hua tha ki aap kisi galat number se login kar rahe the baar baar. To isliye aapka wo login nahi ho pa raha tha to us cheez ke regarding hua tha but maine phir bhi aapko bataya tha koi baat nahi wo dikkat nahi hai mai aapko dobara ek baar bata deti hu services use karna lekin hua tha sir. To mujhe nahi pata wo aapne kara kisi aur ne kiya but wo hua tha. Koi baat nahi mai dobara kar leti hu dekhiye aapke paas link aaya hoga.

Executive: Link mila aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi aaya hoga ek minute ruko. Mail load ho raha hai black box hai na.

Customer: Nahi mam mujhe mail pe nahi aaya abhi tak.
Executive: Sir dala to sahi hai.
Customer: Ek kaam kar do dusre mail ID pe dalo.
Executive: Info wali pe bhi gaya hai.
Customer: Info wali pe gaya hai?
Executive: Haan check kariye info@unitrade.co.in.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo mam wo dusra mail ID hai dusre ke paas hai wo.
Executive: To aap ek kaam kariye suniye mai aapko jo ye wala number hai na aapko whatsapp pe mai aapko link ek baar whatsapp kar rahi hu aap check kariye usse join kar lijiye. Kyuki waise to mail ID galat hi dikha raha hai sahi mail ID pe bhi gaya hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to turn off some PNS numbers.

- Inquiring about calls going to 401.

- Wants to update email ID.

- Buyleads are not being used.



Resolution:

- Guided to turn off PNS numbers in settings.

- Informed it could be a glitch.

- Guided on how to update email ID.

- Offered a video meeting to explain IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- pns, buyleads, email, update, settings
